verbose_text: Studies have shown that Ang II induces severe inflammation and activates redox sensitive genes via the activation of nuclear factor (NF)-kappaB, independent of blood pressure in double transgenic rats harboring human renin and human angiotensinogen genes.
evidence: Ang II induces severe inflammation and activates redox-sensitive genes via the activation of nuclear factor (NF)-kappaB, independent of blood pressure in double transgenic rats harboring human renin
